original_text:
“Woe to him who gets evil gain for his house,
    to set his nest on high,
    to be safe from the reach of harm!
korean_text: 재앙을 피하기 위하여 높은 데 깃들이려 하며 자기 집을 위하여 부당한 이익을 취하는 자에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: who gets evil gain for his house,
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 집을 위해 불의한 이익을 취하는 자,

sentences.original_text: to set his nest on high,
to be safe from the reach of harm!"
